comments.message: We have been using other programs for 10 years and Shipstation has provided us a solution to combine 3 programs into one and saves us time every day. At Sala Graphics, Inc., time saved is priceless. Thanks for the great work!

What an amazing piece of software.
We use it for Amazon & Shopify, absolutely incredibly software that safes us tons of time and money.
Thank you from www.cellphonediy.com
no better shipping solution! very easy to use and saves you a lot of time! thanks
We've used ShipStation since 2012 and have loved it. The integration with Shopify has been perfect. Thanks!
So far it works great and fairly easy to use.

After using GoShippo for a while on our store due to there per shipment pricing, we began to outgrow their service. Shipstation is a full-service shipping application. Including excellent customer service, seamless integration, a nice mobile app, constant updates, custom tracking information, and a number of other custom features for your store. We would highly recommend this app for any business interested in taking their store to the next level. We at Buddha Pants appreciate the work ShipStation does.
this is a no brainer. Makes organizing your shipments so easy!
Use Shipstation with two of the businesses I manage and couldn't be happier with the results. Phenomenal tool!

Really useful if you run multiple stores, we're located internationally so we can't take advantage of a lot of the features that ShipStation offers like their app (which can only be downloaded on the US apple store) and generating shipping labels but it does allow us to process all orders from multiple sources all from one place which is good enough for us!
We proudly use ship station to send Morale Patches all around the globe. Thanks for providing such a great app! We highly recommend it.

One of the best apps any store owner HAS TO HAVE!  Has saved me 80% of the time I spent on manually filling our shipping labels and lowered my shipping costs dramatically. If you aren't using ShipStation, you need to!
Here at www.ycddiscounts.com we use shipstation for ALL of our shipping from ebay, amazon, and shopify. An absolute must have for any small business.
best option available.  tried a few others first.  get this one ;)

For my snack subscription box company, I've tried other shipping apps in the Shopify store from Shippo to ShippingEasy and after comparing them all, ShipStation is by far the best in terms of rates and convenience. Their platform is easy to understand and has really useful features like Shipment Notifications after the shipment hits the mail stream. I HIGHLY recommend using ShipStation!
Love it love it love it! What more can I say!
Works great! Does exactly what it is supposed to and very user friendly.
I've been using Shipstation for about 4 months and i don't want to think about how difficult processing orders was before.
This app is great for any Shopify store that is selling and shipping products. We're happy with it, and you will be too.
Works great! It does exactly what is says its going to do.
Saves my staff tons time.  Well worth it if you ship many items a day.

Very Awesome app there are no words to describe how helpful this app has been for us we sell in 3 different channels including shopify and this has really help us keep everything in one place i love that they made this! and I can even use it from my phone! there are no words that can describe it seriously! MUST HAVE!

This app is a game changer for us.  We sell on various channels including Etsy, Amazon, Shopify and Ebay.  ShipStation pulls in all of our open orders on all of these channels and enables us to manage them in one place.  Unfortunately, not all of the order details can be imported from Amazon (this seems to be an issue from Amazon's end) so we continue to print out our orders from each channel and then cross-reference them with the open orders in ShipStation.

i Like this program a lot.  It should be very helpful with my hemp company.  We make non psychoactive extracts from cannabis and have been having trouble spreading the word because the FDA won't allow us to say much about cannabidiol.  We are looking forward to showing the world our cbd crystals and terpenes with this great app!

We started with shipstation about one year ago and we had an interesting dilemma. We are located in Canada, most of our customers are in the United States and shipping with Canada Post is expensive (as compared to USPS).

Have been using this software for about a year it continuously gets better. Actually found shopify because of ship station. We sell on eBay,amazon and newegg. This app make shipping out all orders much easier. Must have for any serious business.
Been using this for months... it pretty simple to use. Once you get the hang of it, you'll be printing/shipping out orders smoothly. Very helpful app
Shipstation is a miracle for shipping,  I love it.  It's a must have app.

We could not live without this app.  We tried a few other shipping apps (to remain nameless) and had trouble with all of them.  We have had no issues with Shipstation and when we ran into any problems, we were helped quickly.  Definitely a solid company.  They do seem to tinker with features quite a bit - not necessarily valuable to us - but the changes have never negatively affected us.  Highly recommended.
Has made our life packing and shipping orders so much easier! Definitely a must have app.

This app has helped me do a lot of things other apps couldn't, (like the Canada Post app, which isn't really user friendly), but it has a few quirks that make it not as easy to use. I still haven't been able to figure out how to print huge batches of labels at a time, and I couldn't create a return shipping label for a customer in the US. But those are small inconveniences compared the pros-- it's fairly easy to use, and it actually helps me see my orders in a more helpful way, even than from the shopify back end.

Wildly inaccurate declared customs values on international orders, glitches, frozen screens, lots of whirly wheels. Your ShipStation experience if you choose to accept it. This app is not recommended for anyone who sells outside of the US. It uses list price on customs forms rather than price actually paid.
It does so much!  It can be a bit overwhelming at first.  But they have great support and help you navigate through any bumps on the road.   Couldn't imagine shipping without it.

Excellent Customer Service. Awesome App!. I LOVE IT! The best and look no further. Has Mobile on the go, has Inventory management, has shipping calculator to compare the various rates immediately, very robust, ease of use, fast and efficient. Why didn't I use this app earlier, I could've saved myself lost time instead of using the other horrible major Shipping app competitor.

I've been using ship station for over 6 months and I couldn't be happier. They make my life so much easier. Before ShipStation, I was literally printing postage from the USPS website, copy and pasting addresses one by one. ShipStation has always been accurate and a solid platform. If you're not using this app, you're simply not living.

Signing up with ShipStation was the second best decision we've made for our online store (with Shopify being #1). ShipStation makes shipping so much easier and faster. No more need to juggle between UPS WorldShip, FedEx.com, and Edicia, just to print labels. Now we can enter in an address and see all the rates from each shipping provider and pick the best option for each package. ShipStation also puts all the tracking number in for us automatically, which saves a ton of time. We're extremely satisfied with ShipStation, and we're always excited to see new features added.
Lots of support, lots of options.  Needs a few more small additions to make it seamless with Shopify, but overall we are happy with the product.
We're been using Shipstation since day 1. Very straightforward, saves us a ton of time and money :)
Lovely app, saves us a ton of time!

Update 2/3/16 - It's been about a year and a half since using Shipstation. It is by far the best on the market due to its frequent feature updates, customer service and intuitive interface. GET SHIP DONE :)

*UPDATE JAN 2016 #2*
A rep from shipstation called our business to discuss features they are working on.  Sounds promising.  
*****
Oh my goodness!! We love ship station!  This has improved our fulfillment process greatly!  Thank you for the awesome app!
This app makes the whole shipping process super simple! Absolutely love this app!
ShipStation is hands down the best shipping service we have ever used! The easy to use interface makes the whole shipping process a breeze! Great Service and overall a great app!
ShipStation saves us hours of work!

I'm extremely happy with ShipStation overall. I wish I didn't have to jump through hoops to have my scale recognized every time, but other than that, it's an amazing service. Printing out FedEx labels on my Dymo XL is one of my favorite features.

We've been using ShipStation for a couple of years now.  We LOVE it!  It makes our lives so much easier!  We sell on several platforms and ShipStation helps us from having to bounce from place to place just to ship each order.  It's super easy, cloud based, and priced well.  What more could you want?
Best Shipping company we have used. Combines all of our sales channels into one easy to use shipping station. No more switching from one program to another for different websites.
Great app, great service, and perfect integration. Wouldn't use anyone else to manage shipping our orders.

September 9, 2015:
WOW! What a difference a few months makes! So we had tried Shipstation before to have as a backup to our other shipping software (see original review below). It didn't work for us then but it works great now! Now our other shipping software is not working and we decided to see if Shipstation had fixed it's issues and boy is this good software. We immediately switched all our shippers to Shipstation. We love it and it saved us when we needed it the most. THANK YOU SHIPSTATION FOR TAKING OUR EXPERIENCE INTO CONSIDERATION AND FIXING YOUR SOFTWARE!! =)
Amazing app its extremely useful glitch free and fast. Love that it integrates with everything out there

We've used Shipstation for over a year and it's hands down the best stand alone shipping application. Just about everything that needs to be done, ShipStation is able to do. Automated returns and split orders are both live savers, are are batch processing. Definitely a good investment.
Big fan of ShipStation.
Best shipping service we've used.  Easy to process orders.  Love that it's cloud based.  Log in from anywhere and no software to maintain.

Perfect! I've been shipping for 10 years and have used every app. This is by far the best in all aspects. Most of them are made for just a few orders a day, or are far too complicated for the average web store. This one is easy to learn, fast, and has an excellent dashboard. Nothing else that I've used comes close. Great!
Great easy to use and install shipping app!

ShipStation was just great until a few months ago. Then things started going wrong. The app began to lose track of our scale at random times and could no longer read weights. At first we thought it was the computer we were using so we bought a new one but it did not help. I tried downloading ShipStation Connect and reinstalling it but it still did not fix it. So we decided maybe it was our scale and replaced that as well. All to no avail, so I went to the forum to see if there was anyone else having issues. I found not one but many others having the same problem with the printer or the scale.

This app has definitely made shipping easier for us. The software allows auto import of customer data from many sites and shipping rates are automatically applied if filters and rules have been set up. However I'd caution anyone who is looking for shipping software to shop around. Shipstation offers no phone support, the software has difficulty automatically splitting applying shipping rates to orders containing multiple items, and the bulk import tool sucks. This means that if you have lots of customers that buy multiple items, you're still doing a lot of manual sorting. Also, if you run a Kickstarter campaign, for example, and need to import several hundred orders VIA .csv, you're going to run into problems.
Great app to assist with shipping orders!

Shipstation is invaluable for Small-Medium Business shipping. Fairly easy to use, has a bunch of integrations for our inventory management tools and an API that lets me manually pull and process data if needed.

We're very impressed with ShipStation, its proving to be a boon for efficiency here at vitrazza. We easily connected with our shopify store and amazon seller account, and then with 3 different shippers we use. The interface is awesome, reports are great and having all our orders aggregated just makes it all so much easier. Highly recommend.
This app works well for our needs.
Great intelligent shipping app with world class customer service!
Great shipping app!
Worst customer support on the planet. Don't waste your time.
Love this app. It has made shipping from multiple platforms with different carriers a breeze. Plus we can access the information anywhere, anytime. Highly recommend it!

I would 100% recommend Ship Station to any of my friends. I am a 30 year old artist who sells my stuff on Etsy and Shopify. It seems like where a lot of my friends and fellow entrepreneurs go wrong is organization and efficiency.  When I see other online sellers, going to the post office and dropping off all their fulfilled orders once a week, I want to puke. That takes up so much valuable time. And money. The discounted rates is totally the cherry on top when it comes to Ship Station. Customer service is A+ too.

Superstars ship station!!! love love love this app --took years off my life --sends out automated letters for both stores my website and eBay with customized profile on it and message. I can now advertise my website to eBay users. Remembers my ship choices for items. Adds orders together easily for shipping. Already recommended this app. saving money too.
Shipstation helps us get our herbs and supplements to our customers ON-TIME and saves us some money.
Hands down the best app on the store. I would go as far to say that this app should qualify as a Shopify basic. We would not be able to function without ShipStation and their amazing support team.

ShipStation is simply one of the best products and best approaches to helping customers on the planet. We work with many cloud-based platforms. Many do a good job. Very few are as easy to work with, have tremendous support, are always listening & growing. They are sincerely interested and open to feedback. Feature requests are clearly displayed on the site with the status of each...not something you see very often at all. I just hope you guys think about a new platforms for other services :-)
Keep up the amazing work!
Mark

We moved to ShipStation on Lettuce' recommendation.  Our ShipStation experience has been terrific.  My three favorite things:  1) Onboarding call.  To help us get started, one of the SS folks called and answered questions. 2) Slick, thoughtful product that seems to be working reliably perfectly and exceeding expectations often.  3) On every support reply we've received, the rep has not only read our question but looked into our product and done their homework on our setup, before answering.  Wow.

If you are shipping in house and have not moved to a fulfillment center, ShipStation is the best way to go. Perfect for tracking orders, sending return labels to customers and end of day print forms so that the post office can just scan one bar code so that all of your dropped off orders are instantly scanned in. Very easily add postage with just two clicks! www.glamseamless.com

Shipstation helps us cut down on the wasted time we've had using other shipping platforms.  They get it right the first time, which helps us focus on delivering the best beard oils, beard balms and accessories to our customers.

I've been meaning to write this review for a little while now, but like any good love story, taking the time to come up for air has been hard. Also like any other crazy love story, all that comes to mind when I think about Shipstation is a bunch of corny cliches. I'm a stay at home mom of two little boys and started my own clothing line for new moms. I was sending a couple of orders a week to friends and family by going to the post office. Business picked up to four or five orders a week and I started printing shipping online. Then we ran our first ad on Facebook and things took off. Shipstation no joke changed my life. I have managed to keep up with over 200 orders a week (and keep my babies alive) by using the program. I can even make scrambled eggs and print postage at the same time. I can't get over how easily it works alongside Shopify and how easy it is to learn how how to use. Seriously if you are using anything else right now, stop- and bring Shipstation on board. Sometimes at the end of the night when I go to sleep all caught up on orders, I send a little virtual hug to Texas. Seriously, my company would still be a little hobby if it wasn't for Shipstation.

Well put together app, but for small Canadian estores that are just starting out, the Canada post integration does not work unless you have a commercial account (not the same as a Venture One account). Contacted support and they confirmed there was no Canada post integration without a commercial account. To get a commercial account you need to ship a minimum of 750 packages a year. Probably a great app for high volume sellers, but did not work for our purposes...
This is probably the most useful app we have. I love how easy it is to use. If you are going to spend money on an app this is the one.

Really like how we can customize our printing label, packing slips, etc all in a flash. Their most recent platform update was a great improvement over an already strong product. What we like most about ShipStation is that as our company has grown, we've been able to scale up with ShipStation; there's really no limit to what we can offer now.
Great app that makes shipping easy. The two way conversation between Shopify & ShipStation makes keeping inventory, orders, and the customer experience related to shipping seamless.

Amazing app that is so simple to use! ShipStation will save you time and keep all your shipping needs well organized. Fully integrates with your shipping service provider so you have everything centralized in one place. I am not a tech person and it didn't take me long to setup. If you need support or questions, you will get fast replies! Their team rocks!

We are a new e-commerce fashion site called emartcanada.ca, so a few orders only to test, but so far it has rocked and to get the answers from support has been awesome! Highly recommend and cant for us to start pumping out a lot more orders and see how it handles the volume.
Great shipping app.  We highly recommend it.  Fulfilling orders has become more efficient and more cost effective.  Can't imagine shipping products without them!

I am so happy I could cry. I was exporting orders from shopify into a spreadsheet to figure out items I needed to order w my supplier, sorting subtotaling yawn yawn. Now I select my range of orders-print-pick list OMG so easy! Now I get to spend more time doing things that matter. Shipping is a complete breeze. Some of my customers get signature confirmation and some do not. I can automatically assign who gets what. This is so important because should I forget someone needs a signature it could really impact my business. Thank you shipstation you have a customer for life. Rates are 100% reasonable. I saw another app charging $200 a MONTH for someone who ships 500 orders. That is insane. Awesome helpful staff.

I really enjoy the ease of use and what this thing actually does for my business. I can't imagine having a Shopify store without having Shipstation. Support is good, not as good as Shopify itself, but they get the job done. It's missing one feature I'd really like but other than that, it's a solid product that's customizable to your business.
This software is fantastic. "How I made $40k within Shopify's trial period" is a blog I wrote and includes my experiences w/ shipstation. Find the blog here: www.shirtwascash.com
Time saver and headache obliterator.  Manages shipments more professionally even than if I was doing it manually.  Glad I found this.

After struggling for 3 years trying to manually input fedex labels from my growing number of orders, I finally got ShipStation.  It has cut my shipping time by 65% AND it was very easy to implement my multiple platforms I sell on.

We made the call to switch to ShipStation when drop shipping use to take up half of our day. Not only have we seen a severe decline in the daily hours needed to ship our products, but we know that as we grow, ShipStation has our back.

ShipStation rocks. It saves a ton of time when it comes to shipping and fulfillment. It notifies our chef wear customer that there order is shipped along with tracking, and it allows us to quickly print and email labels for hassle free returns.

Ship Station has really changed my business. I have two different stores (Etsy & Shopify) and my business is small so we do all our own shipping. We also make our customer's product when they order as oppose to having an actual inventory. Ship Station not only has helped us stream line our shipping we are also able to stream line our production and keep on top of these orders with the different pick lists and other features. Seriously, have no idea why we waited so long to use it!
Shipstation is phenomenal... makes shipping and packing extremely easy. We would be lost without it!

I love Ship Station - it has been great for shipping via Canada Post with options and features that the regular CP app on Shopify can't do. The set-up is fairly simple and once you get used to it, it's a breeze to use. I ran into some issues with my shipping carrier working properly on my account with Ship Station and I have to say, SS has some of the BEST customer service I've ever experienced. When things go wrong with shipping, it's urgent and they get that. For that reason alone, they get 5 stars from me.

ShipStation has made my life a breeze. Shipping used to be one my most hated things to do since it took absolutely forever, and writing them by hand was monotonous. ShipStation paired up with a thermal printer has allowed me to ship hundreds of orders in the time it took to ship just a few doing it the old way. Absolutely one of the best purchases i've made for my business, and have recommended it to any and everyone with a pair of ears. Thanks for making my life easier, ShipStation!

I wish we had signed up with ShipStation YEARS ago.  It is so easy and streamlined.  Their customer service is A+ and the system is fast and organized.  It has saved us time and money, and allowed us to serve our customers much better.  And that's who it's all about ....our customers.

At Birdsbesafe, we have been selling online for 4.5 years, but we made a change two months ago to Shopify--which was a great step as business was growing terrifically. Even better, then we chose ShipStation so that time could be saved on shipping.

We were on the fence for quite some time as to whether we should use a shipping app (using numerous apps with reoccurring charges can get pricey). We spent a lot of time researching the different apps available, but to be honest it was the free trial with no credit card required (I hate those free trials that morph into automatic paid subscriptions) that sealed the deal and pushed us to sign up with ShipStation. Between the discounted shipping rates and the time savings of using ShipStation, I can honestly say that this app more than pays for itself. It's powerful, easy to use, and has been quite dependable thus far. Very pleased.

I have been trying to avoid buying shipstation. However after a friend that I respect said he has been using it for years and wished he started much sooner. I decided to go with the trial, I was using stamps and or endicia to manually ship each and every order via amazon,ebay and our website.

I have been using ShipStation for over 2 months now, setting up was very easy.  I find it very easy and straight forward.  I sell on different platforms, and I love how all my shipment are imported with a simple click.  The price is very reasonable considering the amount of time it saves you.

Great app, support is very friendly and tries hard to accommodate even strange requests or problems.  Without ShipStation I wouldn't even attempt to open a Shopify store, because I wanted to be able to send my product to Amazon FBA without hassle, and also I wanted an easy way to print USPS shipping labels when shipping from my company warehouse, too.  The discount on postage was just a bonus!  And with one fee for ShipStation I can expand to other platforms as well without worry of adding more order processing time.

I have been using Ship Station now for three months for my small e-commerce business and it has been amazing. As soon as an order is made from my Shopify store it ports over to Ship Station immediately. When I log in the order is already there waiting for me with all of the customers information. All I have to do is select the shipping method and print my labels. Before deciding to partner with Ship Station I had considered other shipping solutions but during my 30 day trial Ship Station was involved and hands on about showing me how to navigate their software in providing easier tips and solutions to help make my shipping solutions easier and faster. They completely won me over. I'm so glad I made this choice!

Really could not be happier with this App.  Searched for awhile for a good order processing and shipping software that integrated with Shopify and the other marketplaces that we sell on. Could not be happier with how simple the app was to setup and have been blown away by the level of functionality packed into one affordable app!
Very simple interface. Customer support is fantastic when you need help! Glad we picked this app!!
ShipStation provides the best, and most responsive, support in the market for Mac users.  Thanks, Ryan, for making it easy for us to ship our VelvetCrates!

This App has revolutionized our business, Imagine not having to check each individual marketplace every single day in order to figure out what shipments to fulfill. We currently have 19 different online marketplace accounts linked to our ShipStation account, using this product has saved on average 2 hours of time for our shipping department every single day!! All tracking info is automatically updated into each marketplace. It also has a very wonderful visual breakdown of customization time intervals for sales of each and every one of your marketplaces. And we feel like the best feature is the ability to see a side by side view of several shipping carrier prices for a shipment.  This product is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!

ShipStation in my experience is one of the best Shopify apps. It's very easy to use and has a variety of options. We use DHL global mail (international and domestic) and Fedex. All of these services seamlessly integrate and ShipStation even allows us to easily audit our Fedex bills. We've had many questions/concerns along the way and the support staff at ShipStation have been quick to respond. Definitely the best value app in Shopify. We even use the import feature for our drop ship vendors.

ShipStation is our go-to app for shipping. Makes things so much easier. With 25+ orders a day it only takes me roughly 30 seconds to fill and ship a order. Could use a lot of tweaks and feature upgrades but I'm sure they are working hard to get us more features. A highly recommended eCommerce app.

ShipStation has greatly increased our efficiency in fulfilling orders.  We sell in multiple marketplaces and spent hours a day in the individual sites fulfilling orders.  ShipStation has brought that work down to a few hours a week from a couple hours a day!

This app has changed my business for the better.  Thanks to ShipStation, I have now incorporated all of my orders from Shopify, eBay and Amazon into one shipping platform.  With ShipStation, I have also created very professional and uniform (same product description regardless of marketplace) packing slips to include with each shipment.  Its very easy to customize the templates as needed.  For instance, my packing slips for eBay orders has a note asking for a 5-star review specific to eBays detailed seller ratings.
Glad I made the switch to ShipStation!! Along with Stitchlabs, my startup runs a lot smoother, and my life is much easier!!

ShipStation has provided a fantastic solution for our small startup to work efficiently with our current small mom&pop fulfillment shop. Easy to use, the workflow and tabbed processes through which ShipStation orders flow are intuitive and easy understood. Highly recommend!
ShipStation works great and has simplified and saved us time with every order.  I would highly reccomend.

Hands down the best shipping solution app for shopify. Quite possibly the best one on the internet, period. We sale on multiple channels; ebay, amazon, and even etsy and it syncs and works on all! I heard they are adding even more support for other sales channels (e.g. kickstarter/backerkit?!) too! that would be epic! I would suggest this to my business friends for sure. Keep it up.
Great App.  This App needs to be standard install on all Shopfiy templates!

This app has made our lives so much easier and we are shipping for less! Filling an order from shopify is trivial and so much easier than before. Even non-shopify orders (RMAs, special shipments, etc) are easy to create with the tool. Plus it gives me quick, easy access to multiple shipping options.

ShipStation by far is the best order fulfillment software available! It is easy to use, can be accessed from anywhere and makes customer service and order fulfillment a breeze. I only have positive things to say and would recommend this product to everyone with an ecommerce business!
ShipStation is by far one of the best business moves I have made thus far. It not only saves an immense amount of time, it is also extremely easy to use! Life saver to say the least.

I only wish I would've done this sooner! It makes shipping and dealing with orders overall so much easier. Love that you can customize receipts, packing slips, and other things, and will continue to use it for all of our stores.
Great app. Makes life easy and the customer support is super helpful! Thank you!

ShipStation has been great!  It totally streamlined our order fulfillment process.  I was able to set it up with all the platforms we use in about an hour or so.  Their customer service during set up was stellar.  They even proactively called me to see if I had any questions or issues.  I highly recommend ShipStation!
Beautiful interface, intuitive to use (maybe because I watched the video!), lots of information right at my fingertips, and quick response and load times.

ShipStation has really saved us a ton of time when it comes to shipping. We used to go to UPS to drop off shipments EVERY DAY! It was very time consuming and it sometimes took a day or two to get shipments out. With ShipStation, our customers are happy that their orders go out right away and we are happy because we are saving time and money!
ShipStation has made life much easier by making shipping seamless with our Shopify store. I would highly recommend it!
I love Shipstation. It's a great app that save money and time. Easy to use and have  smart options. I highly recommend this app for everyone. Thank you.

I looked for a long time for a program like Shipstation. We were constantly making errors and awkwardly trying to ship, print packing slips, and usually missed several orders a week, and got many angry cancellations. 
Shipstation communicates orders directly to me and to my fulfillment company. I check orders in the morning, see how various shipping methods have been automatically applied, I can change a shipping speed, add a note, add a colored label to indicate a rush, or hold an order if a customer has a last minute change. Order cancellations are easy, and done by the time the fulfillment company fills the orders at 8:30. 
We make no more mistakes. I would recommend shipstation to anyone who does shipping of any size packages. The support is also friendly and thorough, with no attitude. There are also good videos for when you first begin.

Really amazing. There are a couple features we really wish the app had, but overall Shipstation integrates with Shopify perfectly. So full of possibilities - we're just getting started but will most definitely be using ShipStation for all our shipping needs. Thanks for making such an amazing product!

Shipstation is amazing! We have increased our efficiency by shipping 10fold!! A must have app for start-up companies that are realizing many orders and few employees to fill them! Let technology do the heavy lifting!

I added a LOT of shipping apps hoping to find what ShipStation offers.  I gave them all a fair shot but Shipstation emerged as the winner of the group. The selling point is how many different storefronts it interacts with. After I started using filters that really streamlined the process. Also, I have bugged their customer service team to death and they have been fast and helpful every time. Keep up the good work!

ShipStation is invaluable for when your business starts to take off. It does so much—easy shipping (of course), batching, and yes, REPORTING. I only have the cheapest Shopify account type so the basic-but-useful reporting is much appreciated. Sure, the interface is dated and could use a tweak here and there (I'm a user experience expert as well, so this could be my bias) but its utility totally compensates for the look & feel. Also, the customer support is fantastic. Write an email and get an answer from a real live human being who speaks fluent English. Hooray!
Love Shipstation. We went nearly four years doing the Paypal Multiship route. Frustrated we didn't go to Shopify + Shipstation sooner. Just a wonderful solution.
We love ShipStation! We're running sales on multiple stores and it's great to manage & fulfill orders in one place. In addition, we use the API for revenue reporting!
Saves me tons of time and money! Wish i had found ShipStation earlier! So great!
This app is very helpful when you need to finish your shipping task via multiple e-commerce store.

This app has been great! It helps me aggregate all my shipping data from multiple sources including shopify. The only reason it's not 5 stars is that it gets expensive when you integrate multiple channels.

I've been really happy with ShipStation so far for my small business. It was immensely helpful during the busy holiday season being able to batch process and prepare orders to ship. As I add more product lines in the new year I can only see this app becoming more and more useful to my business.

ShipStation has completely changed my business.  I have gained valuable hours in my day now that I am using ShipStation to manage my shipping process.  The app is very easy to use.  It is exactly what I was looking for when I signed up.
We were using Stamp.com and then tried another integrated solution, but neither of them came close to simplifying shipping like ShipStation.
